style.border-color: =if([$DueDate] < @now, 'transparent', if((1 - Number([$DueDate] - @now) / Number([$DueDate] - [$StartDate]) >= 0.7) && (1 - Number([$DueDate] - @now) / Number([$DueDate] - [$StartDate]) < 0.9), '#ffd24c', if(1 - Number([$DueDate] - @now) / Number([$DueDate] - [$StartDate]) >= 0.9, '#ff9362', '#bdca73')))

attributes.class: =if([$DueDate] < @now, 'sp-field-severity--low', if((1 - Number([$DueDate] - @now) / Number([$DueDate] - [$StartDate]) >= 0.7) && (1 - Number([$DueDate] - @now) / Number([$DueDate] - [$StartDate]) < 0.9), 'sp-field-severity--warning', if((1 - Number([$DueDate] - @now) / Number([$DueDate] - [$StartDate]) >= 0.9) && (1 - Number([$DueDate] - @now) / Number([$DueDate] - [$StartDate]) < 1.03), 'sp-field-severity--severeWarning', 'sp-field-severity--good')))

children.txtContent: ='(' + if(floor(Number(Date([$DueDate]) - Date(@now))/86400000)==0,'Tomorrow', if(floor(Number(Date([$DueDate]) - Date(@now))/86400000)==1,'in 1 day', if(floor(Number(Date([$DueDate]) - Date(@now))/86400000)==-1,'Today', if(floor(Number(Date([$DueDate]) - Date(@now))/86400000)>=2,floor(Number(Date([$DueDate]) - Date(@now))/86400000)+1 + ' days', if(floor(Number(Date([$DueDate]) - Date(@now))/86400000)<=2,floor(Number(Date(@now)-Date([$DueDate]))/86400000) + ' days ago',''))))) + ')'
